description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
name of data subset – can include different experiments within data set/ different training conditions/ pre-test data/ etc
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -orangutan
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
presentation of the experiment to the participants

number of the food preference test from 1 to 4 -  due to the difference in the preferred food Bimbo received additional food preference trials to determine the third preferred food for Bimbo instead of apple
food option on the right side from the experimenter perspective –  banana_pellet / grape / apple / rusk (as the third preferred food only for Bimbo)
food option on the left side from the experimenter perspective -  banana_pellet / grape / apple / rusk (as the third preferred food only for Bimbo)
variable referring to the food option chosen by the participant-
